FuncDef:
The assign resource-template command assigns a resource template to a VS.
If no resource template is assigned, a VS uses the default resource template.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a resource template.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To assign logical resources to a VS in a batch, run the assign resource-template command to assign a resource template to the VS.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The resource template specified using the assign resource-template command overrides an earlier resource template.
